title: Gilera Nexus
text:
Gilera Nexus is a <a href="Scooter%20%28motorcycle%29">maxi-scooter</a> manufactured by Italian company <a href="Piaggio">Piaggio</a> under the <a href="Gilera">Gilera</a> brand. Sold from 2003. It is available in four engines (the 125, 250, 300 and 500 cm³).
All engines are single cylinder <a href="Four-stroke%20engine">four-stroke</a> <a href="Radiator%20%28engine%20cooling%29">water cooled</a>.
The Nexus 500 i.e. was first presented and marketed in 2003. In 2006 <a href="Gilera">Gilera</a> added two other engines, the 250 and the 125 cm³. In 2008 the 250 cm³ model went out of production, replaced by the 300 cm³.
Version 300 and version 500 remain on sale since 2012.
The new version of <a href="Malaguti%20Madison%23Fourth%20generation">Malaguti Madison 300</a> is the same as the Nexus but sold under a different name since 2019.
External links.
